title: Awesome Web Development Resources
description: This is an awesome project about Web Development resources.

resources.name: Netlify
resources.description: Netlify unites an entire ecosystem of modern tools and services into a single, simple workflow for building high performance sites and apps.

resources.name: Firebase
resources.description: Firebase helps you build and run successful apps. It is backed by Google and loved by app development teams - from startups to global enterprises

resources.name: Amazon Web Services
resources.description: Amazon Web Services offers a broad set of global cloud-based products and services help organizations move faster, lower IT costs, and scale.

resources.name: GitHub Pages
resources.description: GitHub Pages are websites for you and your projects. It is hosted directly from your GitHub repository. You just have to edit, push, and your changes are live.

resources.name: Vercel
resources.description: Vercel combines the best developer experience with an obsessive focus on end-user performance. It enables frontend teams to do their best work. You just have to develop preview and ship.

resources.name: Surge
resources.description: Surge is static web publishing for Front-End Developers. It is simple, single-command web publishing. It publishes HTML, CSS, and JS for free, without leaving the command line.

resources.name: Render
resources.description: Render is a unified cloud to build and run all your apps and websites with free TLS certificates, a global CDN, DDoS protection, private networks, and auto deploys from Git.

resources.name: GitLab Pages
resources.description: GitLab Pages - static websites directly from a repository in GitLab. To publish a website one can use any static site generator or any plain written HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

resources.name: Stormkit
resources.description: Stormkit can easily manage your frontend infrastructure. It integrates perfectly with your git flow. It helps you build, deploy and scale your web apps seamlessly.

resources.name: DigitalOcean
resources.description: DigitalOcean has the cloud computing services you need, with predictable pricing, robust documentation, and scalability to support your growth at any stage. It is simpler cloud for happier devs to have better results.

resources.name: 000webhostapp
resources.description: 000webhostapp is zero cost website hosting with PHP, MySQL, Cpanel & no ads. Its servers use advanced firewalls and include DDoS protection.

resources.name: InfinityFree
resources.description: InfinityFree is fully featured, completely free website hosting with PHP, MySQL and no ads on site.

resources.name: Cloudflare Pages
resources.description: Cloudflare Pages is a JAMstack platform for frontend developers to collaborate and deploy websites. It offers free unlimited bandwidth.

resources.name: Supabase
resources.description: Supabase is an open source Firebase alternative. Start your project with a Postgres Database, Authentication, instant APIs, Realtime subscriptions and Storage.

resources.name: Railway
resources.description: Railway is an infrastructure platform where you can provision infrastructure, develop with that infrastructure locally, and then deploy to the cloud.

resources.name: Fly
resources.description: Fly is a platform for running full stack apps and databases close to your users. We've been hammering on this thing since 2017, and we think it's pretty great.

resources.name: Kinsta
resources.description: Kinsta provides all-in-one cloud hosting for web apps, databases, WordPress sites and static websites. Fast and secure deployments from GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket to an infrastructure powered by Google Cloud Platform and Cloudflare.

resources.name: Fleek
resources.description: Fleek makes it easy to build websites and apps on the new open web: permissionless, trustless, censorship resistant, and free of centralized gatekeepers.

resources.name: Hackertab.dev - All Developer news in 1 tab
Marko Tech Tips
resources.description: Useful tech tips, directly to your inbox.

resources.name: Smashing Newsletter
resources.description: Front-end and UX.

resources.name: Frontend Focus
resources.description: HTML, CSS, WebGL, Canvas, browser tech, and more.

resources.name: CSS Weekly
resources.description: CSS.

resources.name: Buttons Generator
resources.description: An online gallery of 100+ button designs you can easily copy and use in your projects.

resources.name: Layoutit Grid
resources.description: Quickly design web layouts, and get HTML and CSS code. Learn CSS Grid visually and build web layouts with our interactive CSS Grid Generator.

resources.name: CSS Gradient Editor
resources.description: You may only need this tool for creating CSS gradients and patterns.

resources.name: 9elements - Fancy Border Radius
resources.description: 9elements is a little tool, that helps you create your very own organic shape. When you use four/eight values specifying border-radius in CSS, you can create organic looking shapes.

resources.name: Blobmaker
resources.description: Blobmaker is a free generative design tool made with ðŸ’• by z creative labs, to help you quickly create random, unique, and organic-looking SVG shapes.

resources.name: Toptal CSS3 Generator
resources.description: A free online tool for quickly generating CSS3 snippets, such as for effects, gradients and animations.

resources.name: Neumorphism
resources.description: A free online tool for designing attractive UI with colors, gradients and shadows..

resources.name: Scrollbar.app
resources.description: A simple online tool for creating custom scrollbars for the web.

resources.name: Code Magic
resources.description: A free tool to make CSS easier by generating Tailwind and CSS code for effects, gradients and inputs

resources.name: Flexbox froggy
resources.description: Flexbox Froggy is an interactive game that helps users learn and practice the CSS Flexbox layout.

resources.name: Knights of the Flexbox Table
resources.description: Set of challenges where we must use Flexbox properties to position and align elements on the screen to complete a medieval-themed game layout.

resources.name: Grid garden
resources.description: A Grid Garden is an interactive game that helps users learn and practice the CSS Grid layout.

resources.name: Grid attack
resources.description: Learn and practice the CSS Grid layout

resources.name: CSS Diner
resources.description: Fun and interactive way to learn how to select elements on a web page using CSS.

resources.name: Guess CSS
resources.description: Another Fun and interactive way to learn CSS.

resources.name: CSS Speedrun
resources.description: A CSS speedrun is a challenge to see how quickly a developer can complete a task using only CSS (Cascading Style Sheets).

resources.name: Anchoreum

resources.name: PRM

resources.name: QR Code Generator

resources.name: Codepng

resources.name: JSONing
resources.description: A suite of JSON tools, including a formatter, validator, converter, generator, merger, and Mock API

resources.name: Markdown Tools
resources.description: A suite of free tools for converting HTML, CSVs, PDFs, and Excel files to and from Markdown

resources.name: OnlineInterview.io

resources.name: Rtcd.io

resources.name: Flowbite

resources.description: 300+ Free and Premium Tailwind CSS UI Components and Sections

resources.description: The Easiest Components Library For Tailwind CSS.

resources.name: shadcn/ui

resources.name: Headless UI

resources.name: Vuetify
resources.description: Vuetify is a semantic component framework for Vue. It aims to provide clean, semantic and reusable components that make building your application a breeze. Build amazing applications with the power of Vue, Material Design and a massive library of beautifully crafted components and features.

resources.name: Vue Material
resources.description: Simple, lightweight and built exactly according to the Google Material Design specs.

resources.name: BootstrapVue
resources.description: BootstrapVue provides one of the most comprehensive implementations of Bootstrap v4 for Vue.js. With extensive and automated WAI-ARIA accessibility markup.

resources.name: Quasar framework
resources.description: Quasar is an MIT licensed open-source Vue.js based framework. It enables web developers to create responsive++ websites/apps in various formats: SPAs, SSR (+ optional PWA client takeover), PWAs, BEX, Mobile Apps (Android, iOS, etc.), and Multi-platform Desktop Apps (using Electron). Quasar's motto is "write code once, deploy it as a website, Mobile App, and/or Electron App." It provides a state-of-the-art CLI and efficient Quasar web components, eliminating the need for additional heavy libraries like Hammer.js, Moment.js, or Bootstrap.

resources.name: Material-UI
resources.description: Simple and customizable component library to build faster, beautiful, and more accessible React applications.

resources.name: Ant Design
resources.description: An enterprise-class UI design language and React UI library.

resources.name: React Bootstrap
resources.description: Bootstrap components built with React.

resources.name: Semantic UI React
resources.description: Semantic UI React is the official React integration for Semantic UI .

resources.name: Chakra UI
resources.description: A simple, modular and accessible component library that gives you the building blocks you need to build your React applications

resources.name: NativeBase
resources.description: NativeBase is an accessible, utility-first component library that helps you build consistent UI across Android, iOS and Web.

resources.name: Prime React
